item.content:
Hugo Example

This directory is a brief example of a Hugo app that can be deployed to Vercel with zero configuration.

Deploy Your Own

Deploy your own Hugo project with Vercel.

Live Example: https://hugo-template.vercel.app

How We Created This Example

To get started with Hugo for deployment with Vercel, you can use the Hugo CLI to initialize the project:

$ hugo new site project-name
